    • 方法详细资料

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(int number,
                              int order)
        converter int into byte array
        参数:
        number - the number to be converted
        order - according to the storage way of int, converter to byte array
        返回:
        bytes array after converted

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(long number,
                              int order)
        converter long into bytes array
        参数:
        number - number to be converted
        order - according to the storage way of long, converter to byte array
        返回:
        bytes array after converted

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(short number,
                              int order)
        converter short into bytes array
        参数:
        number - number to be converted
        order - according to the storage way of short, converter to byte array
        返回:
        bytes array after converted

      • byteToLong

        public static long byteToLong(byte[] b,
                              int order)
        converter byte array into long
        参数:
        b - byte array to be converted
        order - according to the format, converter to long
        返回:
        long after converted

      • byteToInt

        public static int byteToInt(byte[] b,
                            int order)
        converter byte array into int
        参数:
        b - byte array to be converted
        order - according to the format, converter to int
        返回:
        int after converted

      • byteToShort

        public static short byteToShort(byte[] b,
                                int order)
        converter byte array into short
        参数:
        b - byte array number to be converted
        order - according to the format, converter to short
        返回:
        short after converted

      • byteToHex

        public static char byteToHex(int i)
        byte convert to char
        参数:
        i - need converted byte
        返回:
        char converted
